text: He had almost entirely settled back into his old ways, even to reading law about two. hours each day. Though he did not refuse wine, which the judge always had on the table at dinner, he did not act as though he found it necessary except in moderate compliance with his father's habit.
handwritten_text: He had almost entirely settled back into his old ways, even to reading law about two. hours each day. Though he did not refuse wine, which the judge always had on the table at dinner, he did not act as though he found it necessary except in moderate compliance with his father's habit.
